lead_paragraph: ULMAN--Cornelius M.,died February 27, 2016 in Burlington, VT. Retired reporter, editor at The Wall Street Journal. Green Vale, Hill School 1956, Princeton 1960. Survived by wife Barbara, children Nick and Katharine and two grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ULMAN, CORNELIUS M.
